plugins.name: fpr-editorial-agent
plugins.description: Applies FPR style guide to DOCX documents with track changes. Supports ERSV and WCRP projects.

plugins.name: brand-voice
plugins.description: Enforces FPR brand voice across federal proposals, pillar briefs, public communications, and community materials. Includes voice identity, paragraph architecture, equity framing, and tone-by-context matrix.

plugins.name: fpr-censo-mcp
plugins.description: Census Bureau data for Puerto Rico. Query demographics, economy, housing, education, and infrastructure for 78 municipios and their barrios. Includes data quality assessment (MOE/CV) and contextual analysis.
